entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 22 April 2023
